# Staff Compensation

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/help-articles/staff-members/staff-compensation/

## Category
09 Staff And Payroll

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
STAFF MEMBERS
STAFF MEMBER COMPENSATION
Staff Member Compensation

Mangomint can automatically calculate staff compensation for a given payroll period. Our Payroll Processing app also makes it easy to run your payroll and pay your workers through Mangomint.

We support different compensation methods, including:

Basic Service Commission (e.g. 40% of services performed)

Sliding Scale Service Commission (e.g. 20% for up to $1,000 of services performed and 25% for anything over)

Product Commission (e.g. 10% of product sales)

Hourly Compensation (e.g. $20 per hour)

Salary Compensation (e.g. $60,000 per year)

The articles in this section cover staff compensation settings, including how to set different commission rates per service.

In this section:
Service and Product Commission
Hourly and Salary Compensation
Tips Settings for Payroll Processing
Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
